title: Riot Vs Players Custom Game
body: Hi riot, i was wondering if it was possible to get 5 of you guys and five normal players and battle it out in a Summoners Rift custom game! That would be awesome because i just finished my champion list ! :D

replies.body:
Is this a new thing or did I miss something?
Buy all champs and get a customs game with Reds?
Lets hope people come lol. Let me know if you can find people and when we should do it
Nah, I just thought it would have been awesome to round up some reds for a 5v5 custom game on summoners rift :P
Hell can I jump on this? I've had all the champs for quite a while now!
Add me up and you could spectate if you want sorry teams are full Q_Q

Okay everyone, game is ready. Its going to be Me lilypichu domics jommish hyun vs Riot KateyKhaos Eliv Baconhawk morgageddon and hopefully penguin :P It will be at 4pm pst or 7pm est looking forward to it! Thanks to everyone for hearing me out!
@Riot when is everybody free so we can get a good time to do this?
Post a pic of the store with the champion tab open! Let's see it! :D
I may have lied. I forgot about gnar Q_Q also poor nami but i promise i will get them this week. lol
